episodes.title: 30 Leaving a Cult Part 2
episodes.description:
Let's welcome back Connor to the pod! This is part 2 of our conversation about leaving the Mormon church and Jehovah's Witnesses. We were really looking forward to this one and it doesn't disappoint. 
 
As always don't forget to tell your friends, family, lovers, and enemies about us and visit our website at www.wayitshouldbeshow.com.

episodes.title: 19 Leaving a Cult
episodes.description: This is one of our favorite episodes so far. In this one Connor, an ex-Mormon, and Dean, an ex-Jehovah's Witness, compare notes about their former religions. We dish about doctrine and why we left. We feel like we just barely scratched the surface with this one so stay tuned. Another episode about this topic is sure to follow.
